actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Reported to House from the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service with amendment, H. Rept. 96-543.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Measure failed of passage in House under suspension of rules, roll call #651 (252-133).
Measure called up by special rule in House.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to designate the birthday of Martin Luther King, Junior, a legal public holiday.

summary.text: (Measure failed of passage in House under suspension of rules, roll call #651 (252-133)) Designates the birthday of Martin Luther King, Junior, (January 15), a legal public holiday. Makes this Act effective on January 1 of the first calendar year beginning more than 24 months after the date of enactment.

titles.title: A bill to designate the birthday of Martin Luther King, Junior, a legal public holiday.
